Articles.Content: Within the constraints of a story mode, players fear losing freedom due to money worries which could result in less risk taking. My proposal is a test chamber of sorts. A software testing engine within the research and development building. Where built craft can be taken and tested fully with any number of variables. Different gravity, atmospheres, etc. So you can know how your ship should perform before taking the monetary risk of actually launching it.

But the risk is part of the fun.

Besides we will still have sandbox mode.
Dazhat is right you can copy and paste your rocket tested in Sandbox to Career.
